channel.title: Prom was last night
channel.description:
As of the moment my sister is next door in her room singing as usual, which gets on my nerves MORE than usual right now.
Hung the hell over, and I haven't slept in 26 hours.
Not to mention, I'm putting in my car system today.
How's life?

item.title: Prom was last night
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:45, topic:189974”][quote author=jme link=topic=252989.msg2137725#msg2137725 date=1206590390]

I guess it’s the same for me…
I could say a bunch of stuff but you guys wouldn’t bother believing me.
But if you knew me in real life you would.

Then again, I’m not the one writing stories about a bunch of shit that didn’t happen

Yeah, but when the majority of your posts are about your gf (followed by these long offtopic stories that no one gives a shit about), you can just tell it’s a cry for attention.
[/quote]

Don’t you just love those? In a sick feeling in the pit of your stomach sort of way. It’s so easy to flame them, or just totally embarrass them.[/quote]
I hate those posts. It makes me want to hit the person over the head with a suv. Is it just me, or does it sound like it should be AN suv? I guess it’s because it’s pronounced essyouvee… hmm. A suv it is grammatically, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Prom was last night
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:40, topic:189974”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=252989.msg2136470#msg2136470 date=1206521602]
Yeah, those little perves try to touch EVERYTHING. At least I can touch my girlfriend on the ass, boobs, we’ve seen each other naked too since we’re cool like that. But yeah, my friends touched my girlfriend today and she felt weird, so I kicked all their asses. They’re not going to do that to her again. If they do without my knowledge, I’m going to start breaking bones.
[/quote]

I hope you know no one believes you.[/quote]

Don’t worry, I’ve been laughing at all the various “my gf…” posts he’s made in the past while. I’m sure others have as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Prom was last night
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

What is that implying?

I’d only start a fight with middle schoolers because of their maturity factor. You say the slightest bad thing about them, and they get all up in your face. It’s quite annoying actual. Plus, a lot of them think they’re badass for being at the top of the food chain at middle school. They are highly mistaken.

Read full topic

item.title: Prom was last night
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

I’ve never really liked going to those kind of things, but that was mainly because I had nobody to go with…

My girlfriend wants me to go to her little 8th grade dance thing in a couple weeks, can’t wait for it. Besides the teachers that are going to be there, I’m might be one of the oldest kids there.

I’m going to start a riot with all the little 8th grade boys. They get samller every year, and they’re easy to anger :D.

Read full topic

item.title: Prom was last night
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:21, topic:189974”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=252989.msg2113931#msg2113931 date=1205704305]
Oh man I’m sooo glad I went.

Something about dances makes me just alive inside.
I meet so many people because I’m soo freaking outgoing and I basically dance on everyone and everything that moves.
My administrators and teachers were letting us out and they told me they were impressed they didn’t know that side of me rofllll. thats like 4.2%

But yeah. party was fun.
didn’t smoke cause I have a drug test tomorrow. but they lit up sooo many bowls.

between me and 4 others, we downed 24 bud lights and 21 coors. a bottle of vodka, orange juice, and bacardi.

I got my ass owned in beer pong. 1 vs 2, I was the 1 lolz.
[/quote]

Woah thats what… 5-6 pints each plus the vodka and bicardi… thats not that much over here, the bud light is like 4.2% coor is like 5%

Usually when i go out i have like 8 pints of carlsberg export which is 5% and like 10 shots of sambuca and then theres like 2-3 pond lifes with red sambuca instead of black[/quote]

Meh, he drank enough. Assuming they all drank an equal amount, it’s about 11 beers each(6 buds, 5 coors). Add a bottle of vodka and bacardi to that, it’s enough.

Read full topic
